All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AiSnake
 
Apple
The Apple class represents an apple object in the game.
BoardObject
The BoardObject class represents a generic object on the game board.
Constants
The Constants class contains constant values used in the game.
GameFrame
The GameFrame class represents the main frame/window for the Snake game.
IDAssigner
The IDAssigner class is responsible for assigning unique IDs to objects.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the game.
Mouse
The Mouse class represents a mouse object in the game.
MyKeyAdapter
The MyKeyAdapter class is a custom KeyAdapter that handles keyboard events for controlling the game.
Obstacle
The Obstacle class represents an obstacle on the game board.
ObstacleGenerator
The ObstacleGenerator class is responsible for generating and managing obstacles in the game.
PlayerSnake
The PlayerSnake class represents the player-controlled snake in the game.
PooledThread
The PooledThread class represents a thread that is part of a thread pool.
SnakePanel
The SnakePanel class represents the game panel where the snake game is played.
ThreadPool
The ThreadPool class represents a pool of worker threads that can execute tasks concurrently.
